task.summary: Now checks for improperly redefined names.
Added evaluations section to grammar, updated the adder example to show off feature.

Now type-checking evaluations.
*** CAN NO LONGER USE 0 = false, 1 = true BUT CAN USE f = false, t = true ***
Renamed Circuit to CircuitDeclaration in the typechecker to avoid confusion.
Replaced example with a valid one.
Rearranged entries in the Type Checker
